time and again/repeatedly/frequently

sentences.english: Success consists of going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 成功意味着屡败屡战而不丧失热情。

definition: failed and wiped over the floor (idiom); to fail utterly/a crushing defeat/beaten and in a hopeless position
